sentences.sContent: ...a young man in jeans and a worn T-shirt.
sentences.sCn: …一个穿着牛仔裤和破旧T恤衫的年轻人。

sentences.sContent: ...So jeans and T-shirts are just fine...
...You bought a pair of jeans yesterday...

phrases.pCn: 牛仔裤；蓝色斜纹布裤子

remMethod.val: Jeanswest真维斯， 原意为“西部牛仔”

trans.tranOther: trousers made of denim(= a strong, usually blue, cotton cloth )
